title: Cast a Spell on Me
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Maru have a request for you zura, Nozomi-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>What is it this time? If it’s something that I can do then it’s fine….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>To overcome my weaknesses, I want you to cast a spell on me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru wants to be born anew!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Umm…. I think it’s a bit hard to get someone to be “born anew”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eh? Is that so? But they said if you ask Nozomi-san, your wish will come true....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ahahaha, I don’t know where you heard that, but Hanamaru-chan, I think it’s okay for you to not push yourself too hard towards change, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>But Maru wants to become a better version of myself….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ah, that’s amazing. If you have that mindset, you already are that better version of yourself. I am sure of it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>R-, really!? Maru is better now!? Ehehe, I’m glad that I consulted Nozomi-san~. As I thought, Nozomi-san can cast a spell on Maru zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I’m glad to be of help. If this kind of magic is fine, then I can cast it on you forever<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
